mention.text: Elian Karel , who died in 2009 while incarcerated of undetermined causes
THE PROTESTERS 2012/08/23 ABILA , Kronos - With the third anniversary of Elian Karel 's death approaching - former member of the Protectors of Kronos
the Government of Kronos and the world
GAStech International 's Tiskele Bend natural gas drilling site
the source of both the contamination of drinking water as well as the destruction of the traditional farmland surrounding Elodis
both the contamination of drinking water as well as the destruction of the traditional farmland surrounding Elodis
a radical and violent activist engaged in tax evasion
